[Ring of Ravenousness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2385)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 192 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Carved of acacia wood, a _ring of ravenousness_ is inlaid with a geometric pattern. The ring appears to be a _[ring of sustenance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=459)_. Once you invest it, though, it fuses to you, its effects activating immediately. While wearing the ring, you require twice the normal amount of food and drink for a creature your size to avoid [starvation and thirst](/Rules.aspx?ID=537).
